text: Description. Guest Service Agent. Scandinave Spa Whistler, BC. Ready for your next adventure? Experience the spa lifestyle! Whether you prefer to work outdoors, in the heat of the moment or in our call center, Scandinave Spa offers a different work environment with benefits that focus on your well-being and love of life in nature. HOURLY RATE. $20. WHAT YOU GET. A Ski pass with Whistler Blackcomb (Spirit Pass). Competitive salary. Subsidized staff housing (upon availability). Bath membership for you. a friend & discounted massages. A great work/life balance to let you enjoy the Whistler lifestyle. RESPONSIBILITES. Optimize the relaxation experience for our guests in a natural and warm environment, minutes from Whistlers Village. EXPECTATIONS. Full Time or Part time. 6 months contract minimum. Available to work a minimum of two nights and one weekend day per week. Speak English fluently. Must be 19 years or older. Be legally entitled to work in Canada. PI147213391.

Description

Guest Service Agent

Scandinave Spa Whistler, BC

Ready for your next adventure? Experience the spa lifestyle!

Whether you prefer to work outdoors, in the heat of the moment or in our call center, Scandinave Spa offers a different work environment with benefits that focus on your well-being and love of life in nature.

HOURLY RATE

$20

WHAT YOU GET

  • A Ski pass with Whistler Blackcomb (Spirit Pass)
  • Competitive salary
  • Subsidized staff housing (upon availability)
  • Bath membership for you + a friend & discounted massages
  • A great work/life balance to let you enjoy the Whistler lifestyle

RESPONSIBILITES

Optimize the relaxation experience for our guests in a natural and warm environment, minutes from Whistler\u2019s Village.

EXPECTATIONS

  • Full Time or Part time
  • 6 months contract minimum
  • Available to work a minimum of two nights and one weekend day per week
  • Speak English fluently
  • Must be 19 years or older
  • Be legally entitled to work in Canada






PI147213391
